revised_title: Expansion of Superheated Steam: A Further Investigation
tldr: This paper investigates the law of expansion of superheated steam and compares it with the expansion of air. The authors conducted experiments using a unique apparatus to measure the pressure and temperature of steam at various points. They found that the rate of expansion of superheated steam decreases as the temperature increases, eventually becoming almost identical with that of air. This research confirms the general law of expansion for superheated steam.
